https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nYGLSQElCEkf8mA63KzKf2qTEXD.jpg Samantha’s Montana ranch is her family’s legacy, so when a developer shows up to buy it, Sam isn’t interested. But as he tries to win her trust and her ranch, Sam finds he might also be winning her heart. A Summer Romance
